headline: AMD and Micron Are Top Analyst Picks for AI and Next-Gen Tech Growth
summary: Rosenblatt polled its analysts, including Steve Frankel, gathering their top picks for the first half of 2025. The stocks reflect key themes across its research universe, including the Age of Artificial Intelligence and the build-out of next-generation broadband. Steve Frankel maintained a Buy rating on Advanced Micro Devices, Inc (NASDAQ:AMD) with a price target of $250.
